name: Mannequin The Spotting
description:
The Mannequins are back!

Introducing Mannequin the Spotting, the sequel to Mannequin the Passing!



Prepare to re-enter a chilling world where malevolent mannequins lurk in the shadows, waiting to strike. In this horror game, your survival hinges on your ability to navigate an environment infested with these eerie figures. Utilize the security cameras to discern the evil ones from their benign counterparts, but beware, for one wrong move could lead to your untimely demise.

  • Use Your Surveillance Skills

    Use security cameras to look through each stage to identify the Mannequins through the safety of your room. Engage in a thrilling game of deduction as you decipher the subtle clues that set the evil mannequins apart. Every movement, every change in posture matters. Your ability to discern the true threats and mark them accordingly will determine whether you survive the relentless pursuit.

  • Mark the Mannequins

    Through the security cameras, you can mark Mannequins different colors which will stay highlighted upon leaving the security room. Get to the end of the stage without getting too close to the Evil Mannequins to survive.

  • Play at your own pace in Story Mode

    Mannequin The Spotting includes a story right from the beginning. Play through the mystery of the Mannequins and what their ultimate goal is. In between stages, feel free to unwind in your apartment and practice levels before diving right back in.




  • Multiple Modes, Countless Fears

    Experience a variety of gameplay modes, each offering a unique challenge to keep you engaged.


    * Spotting:
    Find the Evil Mannequins by changing through the cameras to find the ones who change.
    * Path:
    Upon finding the Mannequins, draw a path to safety as all lights are off when you enter the room.
    * Lights:
    More Evil Mannequins are around, so turn the lights on to stop them in their tracks.
    * Shadows:
    The shadows reveal the answer, shadows that don't match the pose are the Mannequins to keep an eye out for.
    * Placement:
    Evil Mannequins stay still no matter where you view them from, observe all angles to deduct the truth.
    * Looking:
    The Mannequins will look towards the Evil Mannequins, follow all their gazes to locate the Evil Mannequins.
    * ? :
    A hidden seventh mode unlockable throughout the game, following a more similar path to the first game, Mannequin The Passing.

  • Customize Your Nightmare

    Unlock a range of chilling skins to apply to the Mannequins as you find hidden items.
    Unlock multiple difficulty levels to really change the challenge, with some changing the rules of certain modes.



Can you outwit the relentless mannequins that haunt your every move? Can you navigate the treacherous corridors, utilizing surveillance cameras to expose their true selves? Face your fears in Mannequin: The Spotting.
